name: MessangiSDK
summary: MessangiSDK allows the integration of mobile apps with the Mobile Engagement platform Messangi
description:
MessangiSDK for iOS is a library created for pushing events processed on iOS platform, 
it's developed from Cocoa Touch Framework and it's compatible with Objective-C and Swift. 
This SDK works as a communication layer between your mobile application and the Campaign 
Manager, it handles all the incoming messages and notifies about geographical events 
with the device.
